content.data:
[Y]Classifieds
[W]Swap, buy, sell, brag.
[c][m.]
[W]The message board is full of disk
[W]boxes, spare cables and heroic claims
[W]about perfect joysticks.
[W]Every advert is short, spicy and
[W]probably typed in a hurry.
[c][m.]
[G]- Wanted: sturdy joystick.
[G]- For sale: labelled disk pack.
[G]- Swap: strategy for platform game.
[m][m-]
[Y]NOTICE
[C]No links, no hype, just plain text and
[C]trust.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
